title: gimbalabs-building network capacity
description: 真に新しいものを作るためには、開発者は、ツール、学習コミュニティ、そしてアイデアを解明しチームを育成するための全体的なサポートが必要です。

f6_assessments.q0: Great proposal to expand Gimbal labs offering of tools and training for new Developers to Cardano. Well defined plan by an established team at a reasonable cost.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is well presented with clear deliverables from an established team which a record of delivering in this space.
f6_assessments.q2: there are clear milestones and deliverables. Even better they have set clear KPI's and attached goals to those. This project as described will be easy to audit progress and success.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is within the challenge goal, because I think this implementation will be core for the Cardano community will help many developer to reach Cardano playground and growth in the future.
This proposal is in continuity with the previous funds and testifies to the team's commitment, guarantees solidity in deliverables, support transparency and accountability for all Cardano community.  This is an important proposal to integrate new developers and connect them.
The proposal clearly articulates the contest, the problem (new tools for cardano developers) and how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem and for all of the stakeholders. Well done that the proposers team worked from fund2 and cotniues to propose and improve tools for developers.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer team is skilled about the context and experienced, knows the Cardano community very well because it has already been worked on by fund 2.
The scope of the solution is well explained (e.g. how the funds will be spent, what features will be implemented, and so on…).
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposer provides a step-by-step plan for the implementation with clear milestones, coherent KPI metrics and a defined time horizon. The only thing I miss in this area is that the proposer has not mentioned possible difficulties and how to deal with them (e.g. difficulties in adoption of the tools/API…) The proposal offers a realistic timetable to complete the work.
In this case it is difficult to establish whether the economic value is strictly consistent with the proposal, since the activities of the members team are not described in detail, therefore it is not immediate to establish whether the amounts and rates are too high or fair.

f6_assessments.q0: I LUV this Proposal!  Having years as an IT Manager, PMP (Project Management Professional) for large corporation the challenge has always been how to make the technology effective for business purposes.  Have you ever been asked the question "Why do we need a website".    As we know that same question is being asked about Blockchain / NFT / Crypto Currencies.  Your Project is not only answering the questions but finding solutions that can be demonstrated. Based on this I'm giving you 'Strongly Agree'.
f6_assessments.q1: I've looked at your previously funded project and also your Gimbalabs.com site. Read your Bio's... Seen live results in the Video in your proposal.  Went to the Discord site and saw 160 of 588 members active.  I believe you have and will continue to have a successful implementation so I'm giving you 'Strong Agree'.   After this CA work in order to support this fund I will be joining myself.
f6_assessments.q2: You have provided more information about your progress and successes via your Video, demonstrating your Even Ticketing System, your Website and Discord that any project I have reviewed to date. Again I'm giving you 'Strongly Agree'

f6_assessments.q0:
I strongly agree that this proposal effectively addresses the challenge for developer ecosystem. As myself being part of plutus pioneer program and a developer in non blockchain space for many years the learning curve for Plutus is much more complex than any other programming language I have learned so far. 

This proposal has some interesting ideas, such as Project based learning via Cardano starter kits, in my experience i have seen you learn more and quicker by implementing things, rather that watching videos on how to code using plutus/haskell ? 

Such ideas in this proposal will help cardano developer eco system grow with a faster rate and help more senior developers learning curve easier, allowing them to help community with the experience and/or build cool stuff on cardano in combination with their skill set be it .Net, Java, Node etc. 

Last but not least, not to forget the ocean and the pond video from charles hoskinson. Cardano vision is to onboard the mainstream developers and not become. a system where you only find plutus developers writing smart contracts for cardano. This proposal is one step in that direction.
f6_assessments.q1:
I strongly believe that this proposal will be successfully implemented because gimbalabs have already proven themselves in previous fundings and with tools they are building to help developers cardano eco system.

In my experience as developer I have seen that the more experience one gains by fulfilling the incremental goals, the faster the velocity for delivery becomes for future tasks.

The plan is well documented and split into the focus areas that define the scope of this proposal. A feedback loop along with training developers will allow them to be part of this initiative and also contribute back to the developer eco system, helping it grow rapidly and healthily.
f6_assessments.q2:
In my opinion, i strongly believe that information provided here is well written in a detailed manner, giving a good insight to community what they can expect from the proposer(s) during the implementation and after it is successfully implemented. 

Therefore, tracking the progress areas would be very easy for the community, as the community can always go back to this proposal and map the current progress with the initial commitment this proposal has very well explained over here.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal aims to improve the opensource tools and services including training videos and walk-throughs with an aim to build a strong Cardano Developer ecosystem. Development training requires tools like the Gimbalabs Playground and hosted services like Dandelions. The existing services provided free of cost by Gimballabs have created a unique community that is thriving currently. Improvements in the current facility in terms of walkthrough dApps and hosted services can play a critical role in ecosystem development.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer and Gimbalaba have generated quality training content and handholding guides. The regular training events in the Cardano are of highly focused content that has benefited a large number of aspiring developers. Therefore it can be said the proposers have the necessary experience to successfully implement the project in a desired manner.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal has quantified metrics that can be easily established are 1. of developers onboarded: 40 
2. of apps created: 2, 
3. of solutions implemented for real-world problems: 2, 
4. No of tools created: 3. 
There are real measures; therefore, the project progress can be measured in clear terms. The project cost is for the payment of three persons involved in creating and coordinating the training events for the time span of 12 months, which seems reasonable.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is meant to be a kind of base salary for the three CO-founders of gimbalabs. All three have done a lot over the last few months to ensure that the developer ecosystem systematically develops and gains in quality. With the weekly Playground sessions, they have become an established institution in the Catalyst Community. With this proposal, they will be able to maintain their commitment for the coming months. I see a person-oriented proposal as a good way to promote and reward proven commitment. All three have already shown their positive effect on the ecosystem several times, so I rate Impact with 5 stars.
f6_assessments.q1: A community-driven initiative like this needs people to help it grow. All three co-founders of Gimbalabs have done this over the past months. They are highly trained to develop new developers in our eco-system. In this proposal, the team details the expansion of their projects and their commitment, and the roadmap provided is coherent and clearly laid out. The budget is easy to understand and inexpensive compared to the benefits provided. The given circumstances and information let us expect a successful continuation of gimbalabs.
f6_assessments.q2: The sessions and activities of Gimbalabs can be followed on Discord, Gitlab and other platforms. Gimbalabs documents its activities transparently and allows the community to follow the progress of the proposal. To further improve the propsal and define success more clearly, metrics such as number of trained developers, participants, etc. could be added.

solution: ツールの構築、教育リソースの作成、プロジェクトチームの育成などにより、ブロックチェーンに初めて触れる経験豊富な開発者をサポートします。
